      • captureParameters

        public static java.util.List<javax.faces.component.UIParameter> captureParameters(javax.faces.component.UIComponent component)
        Capture UIParameter (f:param) children of a component generally a UICommand
        Parameters:
        component - The component to work from
        Returns:
        List of UIParameter objects, null if no UIParameter children present

      • asParameterString

        public static java.lang.String asParameterString(java.util.List<javax.faces.component.UIParameter> children)
        Return the name value pairs parameters as a ANSI escaped string formatted in query string parameter format, only if the UIParameter is not disable.
        Parameters:
        children - List of children
        Returns:
        a String in the form name1=value1&name2=value2...

      • isTransformerHack

        public static boolean isTransformerHack(org.icefaces.util.ClientDescriptor client)
        Method to simply check for the Asus transformer prime.
        Parameters:
        client - ClientDescriptor for request
        Returns:
        true if the Asus was detected

      • getBaseURL

        public static java.lang.String getBaseURL(javax.servlet.ServletRequest request)
        Get the base URL for the request. The base URL will include the scheme, server name, port, and application context, but not the page, or servlet path, or query string. The returned URL will include a trailing slash. eg. http://server:8080/myapp/
        Parameters:
        request - The ServletRequest
        Returns:
        The base URL.

      • isTouchEventEnabled

        @Deprecated
public static boolean isTouchEventEnabled(javax.faces.context.FacesContext context)
        Deprecated. 
        used by DateSpinner and timeSpinner to detect which type of events to use mobile devices get touch events Note that Blackberry and android pad are still using generic events
        Parameters:
        context -
        Returns:
        true if mobile device
